builder.title: builder
builder.text2: he begins crafting more complex tools.

firekeeper.title: firekeeper
firekeeper.text1: the firelight flickers in the darkness.
firekeeper.text2: a figure emerges from the shadows.

nomad.title: nomad trader
nomad.text1: a nomad trader approaches the fire.
nomad.text2: he offers to trade furs for useful items.

straycat.title: stray cat
straycat.text1: a stray cat wanders into the room.

wounded.title: wounded man
wounded.text1: a wounded man stumbles into the room.

noisesOutside.title: noises
noisesOutside.text2: something is moving in the darkness.

stranger_event.title: stranger
stranger_event.text1: a stranger appears by the fire.
stranger_event.text2: he wears a heavy cloak, his face hidden.
stranger_event.text3: "i need some wood to repair my tools," he says, "i can give you something in return."
stranger_event.trade_text1: the stranger takes the wood and produces some items from under his cloak.
stranger_event.trade_text2: "these should be useful to you," he says as he disappears into the darkness.
stranger_event.decline_text2: he turns and leaves, disappearing into the night.

mysterious_wanderer_event.title: mysterious wanderer
mysterious_wanderer_event.text1: a mysterious stranger emerges from the darkness.
mysterious_wanderer_event.text2: his eyes flash with strange light.
mysterious_wanderer_event.text3: "i have something that might be useful to you," he says.
mysterious_wanderer_event.talk_text1: the stranger smiles and produces some items from his robe.
mysterious_wanderer_event.talk_text2: "these might come in handy on your journey."
mysterious_wanderer_event.ignore_text1: you choose to ignore this stranger.
mysterious_wanderer_event.ignore_text2: he shakes his head and disappears into the darkness.

mysterious_wanderer_wood.title: mysterious wanderer
mysterious_wanderer_wood.text1: a wanderer arrives with an empty cart. says if he leaves with wood, he'll return with more.
mysterious_wanderer_wood.text2: the builder is not sure he can be trusted.
mysterious_wanderer_wood.leave_text: the wanderer leaves, cart loaded with wood

mysterious_wanderer_fur.title: mysterious wanderer
mysterious_wanderer_fur.text1: a wanderer arrives with an empty cart. says if she leaves with fur, she'll return with more.
mysterious_wanderer_fur.text2: the builder is not sure she can be trusted.
mysterious_wanderer_fur.leave_text: the wanderer leaves, cart loaded with fur

import_export.title: import/export save
import_export.instructions:
• export: automatically copy save data to clipboard
• import: read save data from clipboard
• fully compatible with original game save format
import_export.export_success: save exported and copied to clipboard!
import_export.import_failed: save import failed, please check data format

settings.title: game settings
settings.import_export_description:
• export: save current game progress as text, can be backed up or shared
• import: restore game progress from exported text
• fully compatible with original game save format
settings.import_export_instruction: to import or export game saves, click the import/export button in the top right corner 📥
settings.clear_data_description: clear all game data and start over (this action cannot be undone)
settings.confirm_clear_message: are you sure you want to clear all game data? this action cannot be undone!

descriptions.hull_damaged: ship needs hull reinforcement to take off
descriptions.hull_excellent: ship armor is solid, ready to go

population.stranger_arrives: a stranger arrives in the night
population.family_arrives: a weathered family takes up in one of the huts
population.small_group_arrives: a small group arrives, dusty and tired
population.convoy_arrives: a convoy lurches in, equal parts worry and hope
population.town_thriving: the town is thriving. word has definitely gotten out

path.embark_success: you set out on a journey to the unknown world...

game_states.dry_brush_and_dead_branches: dry brush and dead branches litter the forest floor

notifications.dry_brush: dry brush and dead branches litter the forest floor

room.strangerCalms: the stranger in the corner stops shivering. her breathing calms.
room.strangerShivers: the stranger shivers, and mumbles quietly. her words are unintelligible.
room.strangerArrives: a ragged stranger stumbles through the door and collapses in the corner
room.lightFromFire: the light from the fire spills from the windows, out into the dark
room.notEnoughWood: not enough wood to get the fire going
room.builderHelps: the stranger stands by the fire. she says she can help. says she'll build things.

mysterious_wanderer_event.title: mysterious wanderer
mysterious_wanderer_event.start_text1: a mysterious stranger emerges from the dark.
mysterious_wanderer_event.start_text2: his eyes gleam with an otherworldly light.
mysterious_wanderer_event.start_text3: "i have something that might be of use to you," he says.
mysterious_wanderer_event.talk_text1: the stranger smiles and produces some items from his robe.
mysterious_wanderer_event.talk_text2: "these might come in handy on your journey."
mysterious_wanderer_event.ignore_text1: you choose to ignore the stranger.
mysterious_wanderer_event.ignore_text2: he shakes his head and disappears into the darkness.

sick_man_event.title: sick man
sick_man_event.start_text1: a sick man staggers towards your fire.
sick_man_event.start_text2: he looks weak and in desperate need of medical attention.
sick_man_event.help_text3: "thank you!" he says gratefully, "let me give you something in return."
sick_man_event.turn_away_text1: you choose not to help the sick man.

mysterious_wanderer_wood.text1: a wanderer arrives with an empty cart. says if he leaves with wood, he'll come back with more.
mysterious_wanderer_wood.text2: the builder is not sure he can be trusted.
mysterious_wanderer_wood.leave_text: the wanderer leaves, cart loaded with wood

mysterious_wanderer_fur.text1: a wanderer arrives with an empty cart. says if she leaves with fur, she'll come back with more.
mysterious_wanderer_fur.text2: the builder is not sure she can be trusted.
mysterious_wanderer_fur.leave_text: the wanderer leaves, cart loaded with fur

firekeeper.title: firekeeper
firekeeper.text1: the fire flickers in the darkness.
firekeeper.text2: a figure emerges from the shadows.

builder.title: builder
builder.text2: he begins crafting more complex tools.

stranger.title: stranger
stranger.text1: a stranger appears by the fire.
stranger.text2: he wears a heavy cloak, his face hidden.
stranger.text3: "i need some wood to repair my tools," he says, "i can give you something in return."
stranger.trade_text1: the stranger takes the wood and produces some items from under his cloak.
stranger.trade_text2: "these should be useful to you," he says as he disappears into the darkness.
stranger.decline_text2: he turns and leaves, disappearing into the night.

outpost.title: outpost
outpost.start_text: a safe place in the wilderness.
outpost.end_text: left the outpost, back to the wilderness.
outpost.notification: a safe place in the wilderness.

movement.forest_to_field: the trees give way to grass. yellowed brush rustles in the wind.
movement.forest_to_barrens: the trees are gone. parched earth and blowing dust are poor replacements.
movement.field_to_forest: trees loom on the horizon. grass gives way to a forest floor of dry branches and fallen leaves.
movement.field_to_barrens: the grass is patchy. soon, only dust remains.
movement.barrens_to_field: the barrens break at a sea of dying grass, swaying in the arid breeze.
movement.barrens_to_forest: a wall of gnarled trees rises from the dust. their branches twist into a skeletal canopy overhead.

notifications.dangerous_far_from_village: it is dangerous to be this far from the village without proper protection

descriptions.energy blade: the blade hums, crackling with electric sparks.
descriptions.fluid recycler: water in, water out. nothing wasted.
descriptions.cargo drone: the workhorse of the wanderer fleet.
descriptions.kinetic armour: wanderer soldiers succeed by channeling their enemies' fury.
descriptions.disruptor: sometimes it's better not to fight.
descriptions.hypo: a hypodermic. life in a bottle.
descriptions.stim: sometimes it's better to fight without restraint.
descriptions.plasma rifle: the pinnacle of wanderer weapon tech, sleek and deadly.
descriptions.glowstone: a smooth, perfect sphere. its light never dims.

notifications.familiar_wanderer_tech: familiar wanderer tech hums to life. finally, real tools.

beast.title: beast
beast.text1: a massive beast stalks around the village.
beast.text2: it threatens the safety of the villagers.

trader.title: trader
trader.text1: a lone trader arrives at your village.
trader.text2: he carries a large pack filled with rare items.
trader.text3: "i have some special goods," he says, "but they don't come cheap."
trader.buy_medicine_text1: the trader gives you some precious medicine.
trader.buy_medicine_text2: "these will save your life in critical moments."
trader.buy_weapon_text1: the trader pulls out a finely crafted weapon from his pack.
trader.buy_weapon_text2: "this is one of my finest works."
trader.decline_text1: the trader nods and packs up his goods.
